sentence_zh_TW: 每一個學生在課堂上都應該有機會表達自己的想法和觀點，以增進學習。
sentence: Every ______ student in the classroom should have the opportunity to express their thoughts and viewpoints to enhance learning.

sentence_zh_TW: 無論是在工作中還是在生活中，好的溝通技巧能大大改善人際關係。
sentence: Whether at work or in life, ______ communication skills can greatly improve relationships.

sentence_zh_TW: 我們需要等待直到所有工作都完成，才能開始下一個項目。
sentence: We need to wait ______ all the tasks are completed before starting the next project.

sentence_zh_TW: 在炎熱的夏季，外面總是會有很多人聚集在公園裡享受陽光。
sentence: During the hot summer months, there are always many people gathering ______ in the park to enjoy the sunshine.

sentence_zh_TW: 在生日派對上，分享生日的卡片讓每個人都感受到了甜蜜的祝福。
sentence: Sharing birthday ______ at the party made everyone feel the sweet wishes.

sentence_zh_TW: 那個男孩以他的勇氣和善良贏得了所有人的尊敬。
sentence: That ______ earned everyone's respect with his courage and kindness.

sentence_zh_TW: 我們期待著即將到來的假期，以便能夠放鬆和享受與家人的時光。
sentence: We ______ the upcoming holiday so we can relax and enjoy time with family.

sentence_zh_TW: 在書房裡，一盞明亮的燈能夠使閱讀變得更加舒適。
sentence: A bright ______ in the study can make reading much more comfortable.

sentence_zh_TW: 這是我曾經見過的最美麗的風景，真的很難忘。
sentence: This is the most beautiful view I have ______ seen, and it is truly unforgettable.

sentence_zh_TW: 當我生病時，尋找一位專業的醫生是很重要的，以確保獲得適當的治療。
sentence: When I am sick, it's important to find a professional ______ to ensure I receive proper treatment.

sentence_zh_TW: 在購物時，找到一家擁有各種商品的商店能讓購物變得更便捷。
sentence: Finding a ______ that has a variety of products can make shopping much more convenient.

sentence_zh_TW: 在所有的選擇裡，中間的那一項最能滿足我們的需求。
sentence: Among all the choices, the one in the ______ meets our needs the best.

sentence_zh_TW: 這次旅行讓我有機會探索新的地方，增進了我的視野與經驗。
sentence: This ______ gave me the opportunity to explore new places and broaden my horizons.

sentence_zh_TW: 在超市裡，挑選新鮮的水果和蔬菜是一項重要的任務。
sentence: Selecting fresh fruits and vegetables at the supermarket is an important ______.

sentence_zh_TW: 在討論計劃時，我們需要考慮每一部分所影響的最終結果。
sentence: When discussing the plan, we need to consider the impact of each ______ on the final outcome.

sentence_zh_TW: 在成功的合作中，雙方都必須為達成共同目標而努力。
sentence: In a successful collaboration, ______ parties must work hard to achieve a common goal.

sentence_zh_TW: 這位演講者以其卓越的表達能力贏得了全場觀眾的讚賞。
sentence: The speaker received accolades from the audience for their ______ communication skills.

sentence_zh_TW: 在度假期間，短暫的停留能讓我重新充電，準備迎接新的挑戰。
sentence: A brief ______ during the vacation helps me recharge and prepare for new challenges.

sentence_zh_TW: 在完成這個項目後，我們將立即開始下一個項目的計劃。
sentence: After we finish this project, we will immediately start planning the ______ one.

sentence_zh_TW: 在公共場合，穩定地站立可以幫助我們展示自信的一面。
sentence: Standing steadily in public can help us show our confidence in any setting.
